Package aima.core.util.math.geom

Class CartesianPlot2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.util.math.geom.CartesianPlot2D
  • public class CartesianPlot2D
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a simple implementation of a Cartesian plot.
    It uses a IGroupParser that generates a set of IGeometric2D.
    Author:
    Arno von Borries, Jan Phillip Kretzschmar, Andreas Walscheid

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CartesianPlot2D​(IGroupParser parser)  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.Iterator<Rect2D> getBoundaries()  
      java.util.Iterator<IGeometric2D> getShapes()  
      boolean isEmpty()
      Checks whether the plot does not contain any elements.
      boolean isPointInsideBorderShape​(Point2D point)
      Checks whether the given point is on any of the shapes of the plot.
      boolean isPointInsideShape​(Point2D point)
      Checks whether the given point is inside any of the shapes of the plot.
      void loadMap​(java.io.InputStream input, java.lang.String groupID)
      Loads a map input into this Cartesian plot.
      Point2D randomPoint()
      Calculates a random point that is somewhere inside one of the shapes of the plot or on a border of a shape.
      double rayCast​(Ray2D ray)
      Calculates the length of a ray until it intersects with a shape.
      As this class uses the set maximum ray range to speed up this ray casting,
      this function may return Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY for a ray that intersects with an obstacle that is further away than the rayRange from the given starting point.
      void setRayRange​(double rayRange)
      Sets the maximum length of a rayCast after which Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY may be returned.
      void setShapes​(java.util.ArrayList<IGeometric2D> shapes)
      Sets the set of shapes of the plot.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CartesianPlot2D

        public CartesianPlot2D​(IGroupParser parser)
        Parameters:
        parser - a file parser which implements IGroupParser. This parser is used to load a map file.

    • Method Detail

      • setRayRange

        public void setRayRange​(double rayRange)
        Sets the maximum length of a rayCast after which Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY may be returned.
        Parameters:
        rayRange - the maximum non zero positive length, that the ray can reliably have. This parameter is used to speed up rayCast. Set this to Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY if you like waiting.

      • setShapes

        public void setShapes​(java.util.ArrayList<IGeometric2D> shapes)
        Sets the set of shapes of the plot.
        Parameters:
        shapes - the set of shapes to be set.

      • loadMap

        public void loadMap​(java.io.InputStream input,
                    java.lang.String groupID)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads a map input into this Cartesian plot.
        Parameters:
        input - the stream containing the data.
        groupID - the identification for the group of elements that will be loaded.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown if the input does not contain the group.
        java.lang.Exception - thrown by the parser when it encounters an error in the input.

      • getShapes

        public java.util.Iterator<IGeometric2D> getShapes()
        Returns:
        an iterator over the shapes.

      • getBoundaries

        public java.util.Iterator<Rect2D> getBoundaries()
        Returns:
        an iterator over the boundaries of the shapes.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks whether the plot does not contain any elements.
        Returns:
        true if the plot contains no element.

      • randomPoint

        public Point2D randomPoint()
        Calculates a random point that is somewhere inside one of the shapes of the plot or on a border of a shape.
        Returns:
        a point on a shape within the plot.

      • rayCast

        public double rayCast​(Ray2D ray)
        Calculates the length of a ray until it intersects with a shape.
        As this class uses the set maximum ray range to speed up this ray casting,
        this function may return Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY for a ray that intersects with an obstacle that is further away than the rayRange from the given starting point.
        Parameters:
        ray - the ray to be used for ray casting.
        Returns:
        the length of the ray.

      • isPointInsideBorderShape

        public boolean isPointInsideBorderShape​(Point2D point)
        Checks whether the given point is on any of the shapes of the plot.
        Parameters:
        point - the point to be tested.
        Returns:
        true if the point is on any of the shapes.

      • isPointInsideShape

        public boolean isPointInsideShape​(Point2D point)
        Checks whether the given point is inside any of the shapes of the plot.
        Parameters:
        point - the point to be tested.
        Returns:
        true if the point is in any of the shapes (excluding their borders).
